1499760.name: MAP GAME: Or Something Soundtrack
1499760.description:
This is the soundtrack as seen (or rather heard) in MAP GAME: Or Something, in mp3 (320kbps bitrate) format.
Includes a few extra tracks from early development, which didn't make it into the game.
I don't recommend you buy this because my music is not very good. But if you liked the music for some reason, go ahead.

All of this "music" was made using FL Studio.
